name: The Royal Matchmaker
description:
Edit : Welp, seems like i underestimated DS3 power, i'll keep working on it after the jam when I have free time :/

In an underground Dungeon, you must save princes and princesses from their prison and pair them however you want.

I started it a little late so i hope i'll be able to finish it, but in short, it's a plateformer where you go around a dungeon saving peoples and putting them together in order to progress.

The scene here is just a test, to see how character can open new routes.

Control :

- X : Make a character follow you or stop.

- Y : Use the character's power (i will add tutorial for each character later)

- A : Jump (+Down to jump down)
